name: Fly&Fall
description:
Fly&Fall Is a First Person Kaizo Platformer, in which you follow the Journey of Jack The Jetpacker. Travers the ledges and platforms of a dystopian futuristic city. To reach what? Only time will tell...

Controls:

LMB/Left Mouse Button = Move Forward

Spacebar = Fly Upwards

You have fuel that is required to for flying upwards however it only recharges when you are falling.

You can move freely in the air with LMB so use that to slow down yourself while mid-air.

The Green Platform is the End.
